name: Big Mac Index
content:
Description: data from February 2022 about the prices of a Big Mac and currency exchange rates in countries across the world: [The Big Mac Index](https://www.economist.com/big-mac-index)

Source: [The Economist](https://github.com/TheEconomist/big-mac-data)

Columns:

* Name (string): country name
* Currency Code (string): three-character [currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html)
* Local Price (numerical): the price of a Big Mac in the local currency
* Dollar Exchange (numerical): the exchange rate in local currency units per dollar 
* Dollar Price (numerical): the price of a Big Mac in dollars
